title: Dedicating the Success of Our Service to Srila Prabhupada | @madhupanditdasaofficial
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.key_quote: Coming up with the mega temples like this, soulful japa modules. How do you feel about your success in the mission of Guru?
segments.summary: The speaker expresses gratitude to devotees for their sacrifices in building the temple and poses two questions about motivation during difficulties and feelings about success in fulfilling the Guru's mission.

segments.key_quote: The path of the devotees is not a path of truth. The path of the devotees is a path of faith.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that devotees live by faith, trusting in the Lord's protection and guidance, and that obstacles are overcome through devotional service and divine intelligence.

segments.key_quote: And those obstacles become an opportunity for a devotee to see Krishna's hands everywhere.
segments.summary: The speaker elaborates on how obstacles become opportunities to witness Krishna's mercy and how the Lord provides for devotees, emphasizing that this is a tangible experience, not just blind faith.

segments.key_quote: If the Lord is pleased then there is all opulence. There is all opulence. There is all victory. All auspiciousness.
segments.summary: The speaker describes how activities at Hare Krishna Hill are meant to please the Lord, leading to opulence, victory, and auspiciousness through the power of devotional service.

segments.key_quote: It is not question of my success or your success. It is Prabhupada's success.
segments.summary: The speaker emphasizes that any success is due to Prabhupada's grace and plan, not individual achievement, and that devotees are simply instruments in his hands.

segments.key_quote: Prabhupada had his plan. When I joined in 80s and all there is no brand in India. Nobody knows.
segments.summary: The speaker discusses Prabhupada's visionary plan to establish Krishna consciousness, highlighting the importance of his books as a lasting foundation.

segments.key_quote: Only one message. Chant Hare Krishna and be happy.
segments.summary: The speaker concludes by emphasizing the simplicity of Lord Chaitanya's message - to chant Hare Krishna and be happy - and the power of the holy name to bestow spiritual energy and bliss.
